title: Concept Map-Based Instructional Design for IVR-Enhanced Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary botany knowledge and VR device operation experience
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive program for vocational training institutions to strengthen scientific job competencies, using a mobile-based IVR learning environment to enhance understanding of scientific content through concept maps.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain botanical structures using concept maps in an IVR environment at a rate of 85% or higher.
After IVR-based microlearning activities, learners achieve scores that are 20% or higher improved in science concept tests.
Learners actively participate at a rate of 90% or higher in IVR learning activities that include curiosity-inducing elements.

resources: 3D Modeling Content Related to Scientific Concepts

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
